parameters.name: ASMGatewayContinue
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to upgrade the ASM gateways for the ASM instance. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

parameters.name: PreCheck
parameters.description: Specifies whether to perform an upgrade check. If the value of this parameter is set to true, only the upgrade check is performed and the ASM instance is not upgraded.

parameters.name: SwitchToPro
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to upgrade the ASM instance to Professional Edition. Valid values:

*   `true`
*   `false`

parameters.name: UpgradeGatewayRecords
parameters.description: Specifies the ASM gateways to be upgraded. Separate multiple ASM gateways with commas (,).
